uws.job.parameters

Interface InputParamController

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DestructionTimeController, ExecutionDurationController, FormatController, MaxRecController, StringParamController, TAPDestructionTimeController, TAPExecutionDurationController

    public interface InputParamController

    Lets controlling an input parameter of a UWS job.

    Version:
    4.0
    Author:
    Grégory Mantelet (CDS)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean allowModification()
      Tells whether the controlled parameter may be modified after initialization.
      java.lang.Object check(java.lang.Object value)
      Checks the value of the controlled parameter and builds a new object from this value.
      java.lang.Object getDefault()
      Returns the default value of the controlled parameter.

    • Method Detail

      • getDefault

        java.lang.Object getDefault()
        Returns the default value of the controlled parameter.
        Returns:
        Default value (null is allowed).

      • check

        java.lang.Object check(java.lang.Object value)
                       throws UWSException

        Checks the value of the controlled parameter and builds a new object from this value.

        Parameters:
        value - Parameter value to check.
        Returns:
        The same value or a new object built from the given value.
        Throws:
        UWSException - If the given value is strongly incorrect.

      • allowModification

        boolean allowModification()
        Tells whether the controlled parameter may be modified after initialization.
        Returns:
        true to allow the modification, false otherwise.
